name: Hidden Magic Forest
description:
I had a strange dream. I was at the gate to the unknown land and curvy path behind was tempting me to follow…
Enjoy searching for items in colorful locations. Explore the world of hidden secrets, mysteries and objects. Find your own way to the exit. Different game modes, cleverly hidden objects, amazing visual effects and increasing difficulty will make your trip nice, relaxing and challenging.

Key Features:
- Hidden object adventure game
- 32 hidden object scenes
- 16 unique locations
- Over 500 objects hidden
- Zoomable scenes
- Scrollable panel with objects to find.
- Three different play modes: Picture, Silhouette, Word
- Three difficulty modes: Casual, Normal, Challenging
- HD quality of graphics
- Amazing sound effects
- Climatic music closely related with the theme of the game
